hubs.name: Charleston International Airport
hubs.desc: is a joint civil-military airport 12 miles northwest of North Charleston, South Carolina. It's South Carolina's largest airport.

hubs.name: Bradley International Airport
hubs.desc: is a joint civil-military airport in Windsor Locks, Connecticut. It's the second-largest airport in New England.

hubs.name: Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport
hubs.desc: is an international Class B airport 11 miles west of downtown New Orleans. It's the third lowest-lying international airport in the world.

hubs.name: Norfolk International Airport
hubs.desc: is an international airport without any international destinations 3 miles northeast of downtown Norfolk. It's the third-busiest airport in Virginia.

hubs.name: Rhode Island T. F. Green International Airport
hubs.desc: is an international airport 6 miles south of downtown Providence. It's the largest airport in Rhode Island... obviously.

hubs.name: Provo Municipal Airport
hubs.desc: is a public airport 3 miles west of Provo, Utah. It's the second busiest public airport in Utah.

hubs.name: Tampa International Airport
hubs.desc: is an international airport 6 miles west of downtown Tampa. It's the 31st busiest airport in North America.
